explanation: Funds are required to continue the provision of specific sustainment and maintenance for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which the Department has historically resourced with funds for the Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative (USAI). Maintenance and sustainment support, such as spare parts and repair services for previously provided systems, technical data packages, maintenance innovation, and other capabilities, remain urgently needed in Ukraine. Much of this equipment can only be procured from. industry and cannot be provided from DoD stocks or via security cooperation authorities such as Title 10, Section 331, necessitating the transfer of funding into.USAI. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement. .
Funds are available to be transferred for proper execution to directly benefit Ukraine through the USAI. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
